trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: 노출 하 고 Active Directory 데이터 저장소에 저장 된 멤버 자격 사용자 정보를 업데이트 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체는 Active Directory 멤버 자격 데이터 저장소의 단일 멤버 자격 사용자를 나타내는 데 사용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: 전자 메일 주소와 같은 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 정보를 노출 하 고 변경 하거나 암호를 다시 설정 하는 기능과 같은 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 기능을 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램이 Active Directory 데이터 저장소를 사용 하도록 구성 된 때마다 응용 프로그램의 멤버 자격 공급자가 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체가 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: 구성할 수 있는 응용 프로그램에서 다른 데이터를 사용 하도록 저장소, 또는 여러 데이터 저장소를 사용 하 여 응용 프로그램에서 기본 클래스 <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser> 를 참조할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체를 구현 하지 않으므로 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>속성을 준비 해야 처리 하는 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체에는 이러한 멤버에 액세스 하면 throw 되는.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 클래스 구현에서 사용 하는 내부 최적화는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>를 호출할 때 발생 하는 특성 업데이트 수를 최소화 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 또한 직렬화는 <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>표현 (에서 사용할 수는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>속성) ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체를 직렬화 하 고 예외를 throw 하지 않고 역직렬화 할 수 있도록 합니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체를 반환는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>메서드 또는의 일부로 <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>에서 반환 되는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: 에 필요한 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 개체는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>메서드는 기존 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 정보를 업데이트 하려는 경우.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 속성 Active Directory 특성에 매핑됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 속성 및 해당 기본 특성 매핑을 나열합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 기본 디렉터리 특성 | 매핑할 수 있습니다. | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>| `securityIdentifier`| 더 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>| `userPrincipalName`| 예. 하지만 userPrincipalName 또는 sAMAccountName 여야 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>| `comment`| 더 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>| `whenCreated`| 더 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>| `mail`| 예. 하지만 유니코드 문자열 형식의 단일 값 특성 이어야 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a| <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>에서 지원 되지 않습니다. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a| <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>에서 지원 되지 않습니다. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>| `pwdLastSet`| 더 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none, 암호 재설정 및 검색에 대 한 질문 및 답변이 보안을 사용 하는 경우 특성에 매핑할 수 있지만. | 예. 하지만 유니코드 문자열 형식의 단일 값 특성 이어야 합니다. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>| `User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) | 더 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|에서 계산 `lockoutTime` 및 AD 잠금 기간 (Windows 2000에서 AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`AD (Windows server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) | 더 | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>| 잠기지 않는 잘못 된 암호로 너무 많이 시도, 잠금 시간 특성이 반환 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 잠기지 않는 너무 많이 잘못 된 암호 대답 시도에 정의 된 특성에 저장 된 값 `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 잠기지 않는 잘못 된 암호와 잘못 된 암호로 너무 많이 시도 횟수, 가장 최근의 날짜/시간 값이 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: 계정이 잠겨 있지는 SQL 호환성을 위해 1753/1/1을 반환 합니다. | 더 |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화 한 <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> 상속 하는 클래스에 대 한 개체는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 코드에서 사용할 ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser 생성자를 사용 하는 것이 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> 클래스 지정 된 속성 값을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: 새 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>개체 멤버 자격 데이터 저장소를 새 멤버 자격 사용자 개체를 추가 하지 않습니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 데이터 저장소에 새 멤버 자격 사용자를 추가 하려면 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>메서드가 반환 되는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>데이터 저장소에 추가 된 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>개체와 함께 사용할 응용 프로그램 코드에서 일반적으로 생성 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>메서드를 전달할 수 있지만 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>에서 반환 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, 또는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>메서드는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>메서드 역시.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>개체에 대 한 멤버 자격 공급자 구현에서 일반적으로 생성 됩니다는 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>멤버 자격 사용자의 주소입니다.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 값.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 이 매개 변수는 사용 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 응용 프로그램 관련 정보를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에 적용 되는 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 사용자 지정 정보를 저장 메모 속성을 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 에 저장 될 수 있는 정보의 양은 `Comment` <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> 정의</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> 대 한 속성

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 메모 속성이에 매핑된는 `Comment` 기본 Active Directory 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 다른 특성에 다시 매핑할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 응용 프로그램에 저장 된 Active Directory 멤버에 대 한 정보는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> 디렉터리 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 사용자의 전자 메일 주소를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: 전자 메일 속성에 매핑되어는 `Mail` 디렉터리 특성입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 다시 매핑할 수 있습니다는 Web.config 파일에 설정 하 여는 `attributeMapUserName` 특성에 [요소 (ASP.NET 설정 스키마) 프로필에 대 한 공급자](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) 프로필에 대 한 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 사용자의 전자 메일 주소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 사용자를 인증할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 값이 호출에 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> 하는 동안 확인 됩니다</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: IsApproved 속성이 반환 하는 경우 `false`, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>메서드 반환 `false` 제공 된 사용자 이름 및 암호가 올바른지 하는 경우에.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: IsApproved 속성은 다음과 같은 Active Directory 특성 중 하나에 매핑됩니다.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Active Directory | `User-Account-Control`| | Active Directory Application Mode | `msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| 이 속성을 다른 특성에 다시 매핑할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>사용자를 인증할 수 있는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.NotSupportedException>모든 경우에에서는 예외</xref:System.NotSupportedException> 를 throw합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: LastActivityDate 속성은 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>클래스</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> 에서 지원 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 설정할 값 항상 throw 됩니다에 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 항상 throw 한 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>예외.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastActivityDate property.
trans-unit.target: get 또는 LastActivityDate 속성을 설정 하려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: throw 한 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>모든 경우에에서는 예외입니다.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastLoginDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: LastLoginDate 속성은 <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>클래스</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> 에서 지원 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나 설정할 값 항상 throw 됩니다에 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 항상 throw 한 <xref:System.NotSupportedException>예외.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastLoginDate property.
trans-unit.target: get 또는 LastLoginDate 속성을 설정 하려고 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Active Directory 데이터 저장소에서 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 사용자 id를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: ProviderUserKey 속성 노출 멤버 자격으로 일반적으로 형식화 된 데이터 원본에서 식별자는 `object`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: ProviderUserKey 클래스로 캐스팅 될 수는 <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>개체입니다.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: 멤버 자격 사용자에 대 한 Active Directory 데이터에서 사용자 id를 저장 합니다.
